name: hemerocallis
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a plant with red, orange, or yellow flowers that look like small lilies and usually last only a day: With a bit of care, your hemerocallis will flower all summer. Irises and hemerocallis bloomed in the dark earth borders.
More examplesFewer examplesThe foliage of Hemerocallis grows daily once the weather gets warmer.It's time to divide any early flowering perennials, such as hemerocallis.If you want a pretty pink, grow "Catherine Woodbery" which, unusually for hemerocallis, has scented flowers.
